history.text: Despicable Me is an animated movie with great review scores!
I really like Steve Carell.  He did a great job with the voice, I thought.
I thought so as well! This movie is great for adults and children too.
Exactly.  The song by Pharrell was pretty catchy too.
I hope Illumination Entertainment continues to produce more films of this quality.
I agree.  I hope Sergio Pablos writes more animated movies also.
I generally prefer Pixar, but I do agree with the critical responses that this was a very good movie.
I liked that this was a 3-D cartoon.  I wish more animated movies were 3-D.
I have motion sickness issues so 3D really isn't that great for me. I do love animated movies though.
It's nice to be able to watch a movie with your kids and be able to enjoy it, like this one.

I apologize,
 but I am slightly confused as my 2nd document is totally blank.
I think the new part is up at the top of the new page.  It mentions Gru being upset that a new supervillain steals the Great Pyramid.
sorry, top of the first page, not the new page.
Silly me, there it is! What do you think of Gru's plan? I thought it was a little silly, shrinking the moon and all.
Definitely silly, but good for kids
I do understand why the 'Bank of Evil' would want to make sure he had the shrink ray before loaning him any money though.
The minions really stole the show though I thought.
I am not sure about that, other than the fact that they get laid off by Gru (as he can no longer pay them).
True.  The part about the girls being returned to the orphanage was a little sad.
I won't lie I totally cried during this movie. I was happy when he adopted them.
Were you surprised when it was revealed that Vector was Perkins' son?
Yes I was! It's a shame that Gru's possession of the shrink ray caused Vector to leap into action.
Yes, it was, but it was sweet for the girls to offer their piggy bank to help Gru.
I was surprised when Vector kidnapped the girls.
Yes! And I really didn't like it that he took off with the girls rather than honor their deal?
Not cool! Good thing Dr. Nefario discovered the shrink ray effects are only temporary.
That mid-air rescue was pretty intense with the moon exploding out of Vector's ship.
I was so happy when Vector was trapped after the moon went back into orbit.
Me too!  He completely deserved it.

uid2response.feedback: This was a good chat with the other person responding quickly.
